parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE. The post includes a CMF number: "CMF: 11240002". This strongly suggests electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE. The post explicitly mentions the PNL (National Liberal Party) and encourages voters to choose "position 4" on the ballot, implicitly referring to PNL candidates for the parliamentary elections.  The image further reinforces this by showing several PNL candidates. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE. This is a paid Facebook post targeting Argeș County, aiming to reach a wide audience within that region.  The use of a paid advertisement on a public platform like Facebook inherently targets a broad population, fulfilling the criteria.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE. The primary objective of the post is to persuade voters in Argeș County to vote for the PNL candidates. The phrase "Votează poziția 4 pe buletinul de vot!" (Vote for position 4 on the ballot) is a direct call to action aimed at influencing the election outcome. This clearly satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE. The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's not presenting news or analysis but directly advocating for a specific political party and its candidates. It's promotional material, not journalism.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct endorsement of the PNL and its candidates, aiming to influence voters' choices.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>8796733477041239</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to specific PNL candidates, targets a wide audience in Argeș County through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to choose the PNL. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion. The post's content is promotional, not journalistic.  The post's timing (after the official campaign period) is also a crucial factor.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>ALIN CĂLINESCU</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>MIHAI COTET</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>ALINA GORGHIU</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>RADU PERIANU</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Alina Gorghiu, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 8796733477041239) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează Partidul Național Liberal (PNL) și îndeamnă la votarea poziției 4 pe buletinul de vot, având un efect electoral clar prin promovarea candidaților PNL Alin Călinescu, Mihai Cotet, Alina Gorghiu și Radu Perianu. Postarea, care conține numărul CMF: 11240002, se încadrează în definiția materialului de propagandă electorală conform art. 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334/2006, având în vedere că se referă direct la candidați PNL, este utilizată după încheierea campaniei electorale, are un obiectiv electoral evident și se adresează publicului larg din județul Argeș, cu o cheltuială de 300-399 RON, ajungând la 60.000-70.000 de impresii, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Contact: senator@alinagorghiu.ro, +40765055855.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
